TableField.name: HazardID
TableField.phrase: Record ID|An automatically assigned number used to track general hazards

TableField.name: RelatedModuleID
TableField.phrase: Related Module|The name or title of the module which is associated with the hazard

ForeignField.name: RelatedModule
ForeignField.phrase: Related Module|The name or title of the module which is associated with the hazard

TableField.name: RelatedRecordID
TableField.phrase: Related Record|The unique ID of the related record within the related module

DynamicForeignField.name: RelatedRecordDescription
DynamicForeignField.phrase: Related Record Description|A description of the related record based on a combination of field values assigned from within the related module

TableField.name: LocationOrganizationID
TableField.phrase: Hazard Organization|The name of the organization where the hazard is located

ForeignField.name: LocationOrganization
ForeignField.phrase: Hazard Organization|The name of the organization where the hazard is located

RemoteField.name: LocationID
RemoteField.phrase: Hazard Location|A description of the specific location within the facility where the hazard is located. Specific locations are based on a combination of field values assigned from within the Locations module

ForeignField.name: Location
ForeignField.phrase: Hazard Location|A description of the specific location within the facility where the hazard is located. Specific locations are based on a combination of field values assigned from within the Locations module

RemoteField.name: PersonAccountableID
RemoteField.phrase: Person Accountable|The individual assigned primary accountability for managing and mitigating the identified hazards

ForeignField.name: PersonAccountable
ForeignField.phrase: Person Accountable|The individual assigned primary accountability for managing and mitigating the identified hazards

TableField.name: HazardTypeID
TableField.phrase: Hazard Type|A combined field used to describe this hazard type when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: HazCategoryID
ForeignField.phrase: Hazard Category|A broadly defined title or phrase used to group similar categories of hazards

CodeField.name: HazCategory
CodeField.phrase: Hazard Category|A broadly defined title or phrase used to group similar categories of hazards

ForeignField.name: HazTypeDesc
ForeignField.phrase: Description|A brief but thorough description of the specific type of hazard
ForeignField.sample: Silicosis is a disease of the lungs caused by prolonged, unprotected, exposure to airborne silica

ForeignField.name: HazardType
ForeignField.phrase: Hazard Type|A combined field used to describe this hazard type when associating it with other records

TableField.name: HazardTitle
TableField.phrase: Title|A short phrase or title used to describe the hazard
TableField.sample: Sugar dust floats in the air while coating raisins

TableField.name: HazardDesc
TableField.phrase: Description|A detailed description of the hazard identified
TableField.sample: Failure to wear proper respiratory protection equipment can result in silicosis. Silicosis can develop within one year of exposure exceeding the TLV of 30mg/cubic centimeter for an eight hour exposure period.

RemoteField.name: LikelihoodID
RemoteField.phrase: Risk Likelihood|A description of the risk likelihood based on a combination of field values assigned from within the Risk Likelihoods module

ForeignField.name: LikelihoodValue
ForeignField.phrase: Likelihood Value|A numerical value assigned to the likelihood of risk occurrence. The likelihood value is used in combination with the severity value to calculate a risk index score and an associated recommendation to mitigate the risk

ForeignField.name: RiskLikelihoodTerm
ForeignField.phrase: Risk Likelihood Term|A one word description of the risk likelihood level

ForeignField.name: Likelihood
ForeignField.phrase: Risk Likelihood|A description of the risk likelihood based on a combination of field values assigned from within the Risk Likelihoods module

SummaryField.name: RollupCosts
SummaryField.phrase: Rollup Costs|The total estimated amount of the cost to manage and mitigate claims related to this hazard

SummaryField.name: LocalCosts
SummaryField.phrase: Local Costs|The estimated amount of costs attached directly to this record

CalculatedField.name: TotalCost
CalculatedField.phrase: Total Cost|The automatically calculated cost associated with this hazard. Costs are caclulated by adding all cost entries attached to this hazard as well as costs attached to sub-records of this hazard

RangeField.name: CostSeverityID
RangeField.phrase: Cost Severity|An automatically calculated severity category, based on the threshold values for Severity

ForeignField.name: CostSeverityValue
ForeignField.phrase: Cost Severity|An automatically calculated severity category, based on the threshold values for Severity

ForeignField.name: CostSeverity
ForeignField.phrase: Cost Severity|An automatically calculated severity category, based on the threshold values for Severity

CalculatedField.name: CalculatedSeverityValue
CalculatedField.phrase: Calculated Severity Value|The greater of the User-assigned severity value and the acutomaticlly assigned Cost Severity value

RemoteField.name: CachedTotalCost
RemoteField.phrase: Total Cost|The total cost of this incident

RemoteField.name: SeverityID
RemoteField.phrase: Risk Severity|A description of the risk severity based on a combination of field values assigned from within the Risk Severities module

ForeignField.name: SeverityValue
ForeignField.phrase: Severity Value|A numerical value assigned to the severity of risk or loss. The severity value is used in combination with the likelihood value to calculate a risk index score and an associated recommendation to mitigate the risk of loss

ForeignField.name: RiskSeverityTerm
ForeignField.phrase: Risk Severity Term|A one word description of the risk severity level

ForeignField.name: Severity
ForeignField.phrase: Risk Severity|A description of the risk severity based on a combination of field values assigned from within the Risk Severities module
ForeignField.sample: SLIGHT: Minor First Aid Injury; 900.00 to 9,000.00

CalculatedField.name: IndexValue
CalculatedField.phrase: Index Value|A calculated field based on the risk likelihood and risk severity. The resulting risk index value is compared against the assigned risk index recommendations entered into the Risk Index module and the respective recommendation is displayed

RangeField.name: RiskRecommendation
RangeField.phrase: Recommended Action|An automatically assigned recommendation, based on the values assigned for Likelihood and Severity
RangeField.sample: Take action if and when appropriate

TableField.name: HazardStatusID
TableField.phrase: Status|Current status of the identified hazard

CodeField.name: HazardStatus
CodeField.phrase: Status|Current status of the identified hazard

SummaryField.name: BusinessConsequences
SummaryField.phrase: Business Consequences|A list of associated business consequences

SummaryField.name: RiskClassifications
SummaryField.phrase: Risk Classifications|A list of associated Risk Classifications

SummaryField.name: RiskImperatives
SummaryField.phrase: Risk Imperatives|A list of associated Risk Imperatives

SummaryField.name: Controls
SummaryField.phrase: Controls|A list of controls associated with a hazard

CombinedField.name: HazardLocation
CombinedField.phrase: Hazard Location|A combined field used to display the hazard location when associating it with other records

LinkField.name: RelatedRecordLink
LinkField.phrase: Related Record Link|An internal link to the related record.

CombinedField.name: RelatedModuleRecord
CombinedField.phrase: Related Record|A combined field used to display the related module name and record ID

CombinedField.name: RecordLabel
CombinedField.phrase: Record Label|The short, concise, label of the record for display purposes

CombinedField.name: Hazard
CombinedField.phrase: Hazard|A combined field used to describe this hazard when associating it with other records

SampleItem.name: LOW: Possible but unlikely to occur
PROBABLE: Very likely to occur in immediate future
SLIGHT: Minor First Aid Injury; 900.00 to 9,000.00
SERIOUS: Serious injury or illness; 9001.00 to 90,000.00
SEVERE: Death or disabling injury; 90,001.00 to 900,000.00
CATASTROPHIC: Deaths and/or disabling injuries; 900,001.00 to 1,000,000.00

CodeCheckSearchField.name: ConsequenceCategoryID
CodeCheckSearchField.phrase: Business Consequences|Filter search results by one or more related business consequences

CodeCheckSearchField.name: ControlCategoryID
CodeCheckSearchField.phrase: Controls|Filter search results by one or more related controls

CodeCheckSearchField.name: RiskClassID
CodeCheckSearchField.phrase: Risk Classifications|Filter search results by one or more related risk classifications

CodeCheckSearchField.name: RiskImperativeID
CodeCheckSearchField.phrase: Risk Imperatives|Filter search results by one or more related risk imperatives

ViewScreen.name: View
ViewScreen.phrase: View|View summary information about an organizational hazard

EditScreen.name: Form
EditScreen.phrase: Form|Edit summary information about an organizational hazard

PROBABLE: Very likely to occur in immediate future
SLIGHT: Minor First Aid Injury; 900.00 to 9,000.00
SERIOUS: Serious injury or illness; 9001.00 to 90,000.00

EditScreen.name: Controls
EditScreen.phrase: Controls|Associate controls and related responsibilities with the hazard

EditScreen.name: BusinessConsequences
EditScreen.phrase: Consequences|Associate business consequences with the hazard

EditScreen.name: WorkOrders
EditScreen.phrase: Orders|Associate hazard abatement work orders with the hazard

EditScreen.name: Classifications
EditScreen.phrase: Classifications|Associate risk classifications with the hazard

EditScreen.name: Imperatives
EditScreen.phrase: Imperatives|Associate risk imperatives with the hazard

EditScreen.name: Accountability
EditScreen.phrase: Accountability|Associate participants with ongoing accountabilities for the hazard

EditScreen.name: Involvement
EditScreen.phrase: Involvement|Associate participants involved with the hazard

EditScreen.name: FileRetention
EditScreen.phrase: Files|Associate file retention methods with the hazard

EditScreen.name: BestPractices
EditScreen.phrase: Best Practices|Associate best practices with the hazard

RecordReportScreen.name: Reports
RecordReportScreen.phrase: Reports|View reports for this job analysis

MemoField.name: HazardDesc
MemoField.sample: Failure to wear proper respiratory protection equipment can result in silicosis. Silicosis can develop within one year of exposure exceeding the TLV of 30mg/cubic centimeter for an eight hour exposure period.

SampleItem.name: LOW: Possible but unlikely to occur
PROBABLE: Very likely to occur in immediate future
SLIGHT: Minor First Aid Injury; 900.00 to 9,000.00
SERIOUS: Serious injury or illness; 9001.00 to 90,000.00
SEVERE: Death or disabling injury; 90,001.00 to 900,000.00
CATASTROPHIC: Deaths and/or disabling injuries; 900,001.00 to 1,000,000.00

DocumentationSection.title: Introduction
DocumentationSection.p: The installation-specific introduction to the scope and purpose of this module should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said to introduce this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: Implementation
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific implementation rules, policies, practices should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about implementating this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: People Elements
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific information regarding the way this module impacts people should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about how this module impacts, or is impacted by, people in general. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.
